Ina

Introduction

Jeung Yina, known under her stage name INA, is a South Korean-Australian dancer, rapper, and singer-songwriter under BPM Entertainment. She is best known as a member of the girl group BADVILLAIN.

On May 15, 2024, INA was revealed as the third member of BADVILLAIN. The group officially debuted on June 3, 2024, with their debut single album "OVERSTEP".
